Christmas Decorations

Christmas Decorations string lights

Christmas Decorations

【Safe and Easy to Use】LED Waterfall Lights output voltage is 29V with UL Certified to ensure safety use. and this outdoor christmas decorations clearance is safe to touch and will keep at a low-temperature state after lighting up for hours. It’s very safe, power-saving, and environmentally friendly.
【8 Lights Modes & IP44 Waterproof】The fairy lights have 8 different light patterns: Combination, In Wave, Sequential, Slo-Glo, Chasing/Flash, Slow fade, Twinkle/Flash, Steady on. IP44 waterproof is perfect for outdoor use without any damage, including heavy rain and snow.
【Ideal Gift & Decoration Choice】 This christmas decorations outdoor yard lights can be hung on eaves, porches and trees. Widely use to hanging Christmas tree outdoor, Yards, porches, patio, garden, wall, window, bedroom, living room, wedding, party, birthday, Christmas etc.
【Timer Function & Friendly Service】Built-in timer function, Press the timer button and the indicator light on the controller will light up, which means the lights will automatically light up for 6 hours and turn off for 18 hours. We support 12 month free replacement and provide 24-hour online customer service, please do not hesitate to contact us if you have any question.

Easy to Use

The christmas tree decorations lights have two control ways, which is the mode button of the plug and the remote control. You can adjust the brightness from 100%, 75%, 50%, 25%. According to your actual needs choose the comfortable brightness. It can create a romatic atmosphere for your life.

Low Voltage & UL Certification

This Christmas lights use 29V safety low voltage , which strictly tested and meets the US requirements of string lights UL safety standards, More safety and less power consumption. No danger of electric shock, lower than standard body safe voltage 36V.

Outdoor Waterproof Designed

The high waterproof rating and strong construction is durable enough to stand complex climates, ideal for home decor, holiday outdoor decorations, garden decor for outside, new year decorations and can work normally even in cold winter.

item.title: Loomla Cat Water Fountain, 85oz/2.5L Pet Water Fountain Indoor, Automatic Dog Water Dispenser with Switchable LED Lights, 2 Replacement Filters for Cats, Dogs, Pets
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) Loomla: Provide your pets with a high-quality daily life. Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 8.66 x 8.66 x 5.9 inches; 1.98 Pounds Item model number ‏ : ‎ VC1402 Date First Available ‏ : ‎ May 27, 2021 Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Shenzhen Jiangrui Investment Development ASIN ‏ : ‎ ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $35.99 - $24.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 12:45:43 UTC – Details)


Loomla: Provide your pets with a high-quality daily life.
Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 8.66 x 8.66 x 5.9 inches; 1.98 Pounds
Item model number ‏ : ‎ VC1402
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ May 27, 2021
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Shenzhen Jiangrui Investment Development
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B08NKF9PLS

High Capacity – Staying hydrated can be a challenge for pets, especially during the summer months. The Loomla stainless steel cat water fountain is your answer to a long-lasting water supply for small pets in your home. The dog and cat water fountain holds 85 ounces, it’s enough water for a small animal for almost a week! The water level window shows you how much is left in the cat and dog water bowl dispenser, so your pet can stay hydrated and not get thirsty.
Whisper-quiet – This water fountain for cats inside has a water pump that is so quiet, you’d never know it’s there! The low noise water dispenser for cats and dogs is a great way to help your pets stay calm and hydrated at night. Many animals are frightened by loud noises, so the quiet design of this dog and cat fountain water bowl makes it more enticing for animal owners who want their pets healthy and content.
Entertainment For Your Pet – Our cat and dog water fountain was designed with your pets in mind and provides an easy way for them to quench their thirst while having fun at the same time! A pet water fountain can be just the cool thing you need in order to keep your little buddy hydrated and entertained. Pet supplies water fountains are an amusing way of making water enjoyable for animals.
Always Clean & Fresh Water – Don’t let your pets go thirsty! Our pet fountain is a great way to keep your furry friends hydrated. The dog and cat water dispenser ensures that no matter how busy you might be, they’ll always have clean and fresh water to drink. The cat and dog water dispenser filter uses multiple purification systems, it purifies the water using carbon non-woven fabric and ion exchange resin. 2 exchange filters are included with the dog and cat supplies water fountain.

Why should you choose the Loomla Water Fountains?

  • Fun for your pet – For your pets drinking from a drinking fountain is way more interesting and fun than just drinking out of their bowl.
  • Stylish Design – The pet drinking fountain has lovely and stylish bellflower design and comes in a variety of colors that make it an attractive home decor item.
  • 3 Water Flow Settings – Adjusting the automatic water dispenser settings to match your pet’s size and tastes is easy. Just choose one of our automatic drink dispenser modes: Flower waterfall / Waterfall and fountain / Fountain
  • Healthy choice – Clean water is one of the most important aspects of your pet’s health. Pet water fountain filter has an upgraded sophisticated filtration system that filters water better than ever before.
  • Easy Installation – Our automatic dog water dispenser is easy to set up, just affix the pump, install led next to the water level window, add filter and drinking dish on top, and you are good to go! We also provide a manual with our water fountain for dogs inside.

Read more

Structure of Loomla Fountain

Take Good Care of Your Pet

What should you pay attention to?

  1. The fountain’s LED lights have two modes that can be controlled on and off.
  2. The pump has two locating holes to assist installation.
  3. Please use it indoors on a flat surface.
  4. For your pet’s health and safety, clean the water pump at least once every two weeks.
  5. To provide clean enough water continuously, please replace the filter and the sponge every two or three weeks, and rinse the filter with water before use.
  6. Please be careful to prevent pets from chewing the wires and swallowing the parts.

What You Will Get:

1 x Pet Water Fountain（8.66 x 8.66 x 5.9in）

1 x Adapter（AC 100-240V）

1 x DC Pump (with a 70.9in cord）

2 x Filters

1 x Pre-filter Sponge

1 x Instruction Manual

Product Description

How to install the Lighted Gift Boxes

1. Insert the mounting rod into the folded gift box to support them to a cube.

2. Put them anywhere you like. If used outdoor, use the stakes to fix them to the ground.

3. Plug in and the lights will turn on.

Warning

1. Please cover the plug with a box if used outside.

2. Please unplug this item when not in use.

3. Children must use under the guidance of adults and be kept away from heat sources to avoid accidents.

Specifications Shell Material: Scallion cloth and iron frame IP Rating: IP44 waterproof Boxes Spacing: 10 in Lead Length: 118 in Bulb QTY: 60 count Input:120V~60Hz,0.12A Output: 4.5V,1A Power: AC/DC

Attractive Design – The lighted gift boxes are designed with Christmas elements like snowflakes pattern, pine cones, pine needles, red berries and classic Christmas colors, red, green and blue. The bows are detachable, you can attach them to different boxes as you like
3 Sizes Light Up Christmas Presents – 10″x10″x10″ large red box with 25 led bulbs, 8″x8″x8″ medium green box with 20 led bulbs, 6″x6″x6″ small blue box with 15 led bulbs. The lights are warm white, creating a cozy Christmas atmosphere
Easy to Install and Disassemble – Just insert support rods into the boxes, and put them anywhere indoors. Use the stakes to fix them to the ground if used outdoor. The pop up Christmas gift boxes decorations are retractable for easy storage
Durable Material – Sturdy metal frame supports the Christmas light up decorations. The Scallion cloth covered on the outside is waterproof and not easy to fade. The bulbs are buckled for a beautiful light effect, match your Christmas tree decorations well
Indoor and Outdoor Use – Christmas lighted gift boxes are IP44 waterproof, are perfect outdoor lighted holiday displays for your walkway, yard, porch, or indoor Christmas decorations for locations like living room. Please cover the plug with a box if used outside

Product Description

Safe to Use

Plug the light into any outlet or power source to use the fairy lights.There is a button on the plug that you can use to change the lighting mode and turn the light on and off.

Timer Function

The lights will automatically turn on for 6 hours and off for 18 hours.

9 x Fixing nails included

With fixing nails included in the package, you can easily fix the light string to the lawn.

8 Lighting Modes

This Christmas light has 8 lighting modes: Combination, In Waves, Sequential, Slo-Glo, Chasing/ Flash, Slow Fade, Twinkle/ Flash, Steady On.

Memory Function

With the memory function, the string light remembers the last mode. If you like the lighting modes which set up last time, and you don’t need to change the mode when turn on the light again.

Perfect Decoration

This is a good helper for Christmas decoration, you can decorate the house, Christmas tree, etc. It is also an excellent gift for your family and friends.

From the brand

BSGlobal LED Lights

Large Cover Size Net Lights


Solar Powered LED Christmas String Lights Outdoor Indoor Decoration

  • Christmas Wide Angle LED String Lights – Light Up Your Life

5MM led string lights surface is wide angle concave lens, with multi-angle light source, more dispersed and clear than other shapes of light, radiating a halo of light in all directions, shining but not too dazzling.

  • Extra Long Christmas String Lights

100Ft extra long outdoor wide angle string lights with 300 high quality LED, mini beads sealed against moisture, eliminate corrosion. Maximize the durability and practicality of the string lights.

  • Energy Efficient

High-quality solar panels can store a lot of electricity, and the high-bright LED light saves more energy than traditional decorative light sections, with a bulb life of up to 5,000 hours.

Auto ON/OFF Solar Lights String

  • Higher Solar Conversion
  • 6-8 hours auto charge during the day
  • Longer Working Time
  1. Auto light up for 8-12 hours when motion is detected at night
  2. Ensure that the solar panels are directly exposed to sunlight to complete the conversion of light energy into electricity.
  • Note:
  1. Please turn on the lights when charging and the light will not be on when the solar panel is absorbing solar energy.L
  2. ight sensor control, it only lights in certain dim environments or darker. But it will light as the panel covered even in daytime.

Read more

Commercial Grade 5MM Christmas Lights with Multi-function Remote Control

  • 8 Lighting Modes

Combination, in waves, sequential, slogs, chasing/flash, slow fade, twinkle/flash, and steady on. 8 different light modes to create different styles of atmosphere and enjoy a unique light show.

  • Timer Function & Memory Function

Auto charge during the day and light up at night, 24 hours cycle. And with memory function, retain the mode before shutdown, no need to repeat the settings, saving your time and energy.

  • Durable Green Wire

Thicker and more robust than traditional lights wire. Can withstand the wear and tear of indoor or outdoor use.

  • Widely Use – Decorate Your Life

Perfect for Christmas, party, garden, Valentine’s Day, wedding, home, window, bathroom, festival, holiday, shows, restaurant, hotel, commercial building, shopping center etc.

Product Description

2-in-1 Halloween Christmas Projector Lights Moving Patterns Landscape Waterproof Light

Specifications:

Power Output: 14V

Power Consumption: 10.5W

Waterproof Grade: IP65

Power Input: 100-240V, 50/60HZ

Projection Distance: 3-7m / 8.94-22.96ft

Use Scene: Indoor/Outdoor

16 Slides Patterns Mode & 10 Colors Water Wave Mode Create Various Effects for Holiday

16 Holiday Slides Patterns: 5 for Christmas 3 for Halloween 1 for Thanksgiving 1 for Birthday 6 for Celebration

Package Includes:

1 * LED Projector Light

1 * Remote Controller (Without Batteries)

16 * Pattern Slides

1 * Power Adapter

1 * Flat Base

1 * Ground Stake

1 * User Manual

IP65 Waterproof & Easy to Install: The Christmas projector light is designed with an IP65 waterproof rating that is suitable for rain or snow weather. Note: Do not soak it in the water directly. It is easy to install, just find the place you want then plug it into the ground, stable and durable.
Indoor & Outdoor Use: Find the place you want then plug it on the ground, fixed on the wall, ceiling, or put it on a flat surface. To better work (get better brightness and visibility)in the dark environment, place the floodlight 10 -15ft from the projection surface. You also can remotely control the color setting.
Wireless Remote & Auto-Timer: The Halloween Christmas projector light comes with a remote controller and timer . You could use the RF wireless remote control to turn on or off the light, set time 2/4 hours, switch the color of the light, moving speed, and flashing speed to create a fantastical and dynamic effect.
Wonderful Holiday Decoration: This Christmas projector light has 16 slides, the best choice to liven up the atmosphere, suitable for Halloween, Christmas, Thanksgiving day, Valentine’s Day, birthday, holidays, etc. Also Great for a gift for family, relatives, friends or colleagues.
